all the GloVe - based methods.from sentence: Among all the GloVe - based methods , the TD - LSTM approach performs worst because it takes the aspect information into consideration in a very coarse way .

After taking.from sentence: After taking the importance of the aspect into account with attention mechanism , they achieve a stable improvement comparing to the TD - LSTM .

RAM.from sentence: RAM achieves a better performance than other basic attention - based models , because it combines multiple attentions with a recurrent neural network to capture aspect - specific representations .

achieves.from sentence: PBAN achieves a similar performance as RAM by employing a position embedding .

worse than.from sentence: To be specific , PBAN is better than RAM on Restaurant dataset , but worse than RAN on Laptop dataset .

AEN.from sentence: AEN is slightly better than TSN , but still worse than RAM and PBAN .

two models ( SDGCN - A and SDGCN - G ).from sentence: Moreover , the two models ( SDGCN - A and SDGCN - G ) with position information gain a significant improvement compared to the two models without position information .

RAM and PBAN.from sentence: Compared with RAM and PBAN , the over all performance of TSN is not perform well on both Restaurant dataset and Laptop dataset , which might because the framework of TSN is too simple to model the representations of context and aspect effectively .

GCN.from sentence: Comparing the results of SDGCN - A w/o position and SDGCN - G w/o position , SDGCN - A and SDGCN - G , respectively , we observe that the GCN built with global - relation is slightly higher than built with adjacent - relation in both accuracy and Macro - F1 measure .

Benefits from.from sentence: Benefits from the power of pre-trained BERT , BERT - based models have shown huge superiority over GloVe - based models .

compared with.from sentence: Furthermore , compared with AEN - BERT , on the Restaurant dataset , SDGCN - BERT achieves absolute increases of 1.09 % and 1.86 % in accuracy and Macro - F1 measure respectively , and gains absolute increases of 1.42 % and 2.03 % in accuracy and Macro - F1 measure respectively on the Laptop dataset .
